headline: Akebia Therapeutics Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results and Recent Business Highlights
summary: Continued Vafseo® (vadadustat) growth with Q2 2025 net product revenues increasing to $13.3 million; Total Q2 2025 net product revenues increased to $60.5 million DaVita physicians are expected to begin treating patients with Vafseo in August 2025 as part of an operational pilot at 100+ DaVita dialysis clinics Patient enrollment completed in VOICE, a collaborative clinical trial of Vafseo conducted by USRC Akebia to host Conference Call at 8:00 a.m. ET on Thursday, August 7, 2025 CAMBRIDGE, Mass

content.title: Akebia Therapeutics Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results and Recent Business Highlights
content.summary: Continued Vafseo® (vadadustat) growth with Q2 2025 net product revenues increasing to $13.3 million; Total Q2 2025 net product revenues increased to $60.5 million DaVita physicians are expected to begin treating patients with Vafseo in August 2025 as part of an operational pilot at 100+ DaVita dialysis clinics Patient enrollment completed in VOICE, a collaborative clinical trial of Vafseo conducted by USRC Akebia to host Conference Call at 8:00 a.m. ET on Thursday, August 7, 2025 CAMBRIDGE, Mass
